@package otel-instrumentation-persistent
@version 0.0.0

module OTel.Instrumentation.Persistent.Internal
buildSqlPoolHooks :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracerProvider -> IO (SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend)
sqlPoolHooks :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracingBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend
setNewAlterBackend :: TracingBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend
setNewRunBefore :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracingBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend
setNewRunAfter :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracingBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend
setNewRunOnException :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracingBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend -> SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend
modifyRunOnException :: forall m backend. SqlPoolHooks m backend -> ((backend -> Maybe IsolationLevel -> SomeException -> m ()) -> backend -> Maybe IsolationLevel -> SomeException -> m ()) -> SqlPoolHooks m backend
modifyGetStatement :: SqlBackendHooks -> ((SqlBackend -> Text -> Statement -> IO Statement) -> SqlBackend -> Text -> Statement -> IO Statement) -> SqlBackendHooks
unsafeTracedAcquire :: TracingBackend -> SpanSpec -> Acquire a -> Acquire a
persistValuesToAttrs :: [PersistValue] -> AttrsBuilder 'AttrsForSpan
newtype Bytes
Bytes :: ByteString -> Bytes
[unBytes] :: Bytes -> ByteString
instance OTel.API.Common.Internal.ToAttrVal OTel.Instrumentation.Persistent.Internal.Bytes Data.Text.Internal.Text

module OTel.Instrumentation.Persistent
buildSqlPoolHooks :: forall m. (MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => TracerProvider -> IO (SqlPoolHooks m SqlBackend)
